Evoke a heavenly flare and possibly Blind your target.

Blinding Smite is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Blinding Smite is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
